Companies can easily understand where they should apply and what application form they should use, while spectators are able to quickly figure out where they can buy tickets and what they should wear to the event.

Intellisense устанавливает на объектах с: IntelliSense installs multiple sensors based on the ARM Cortex-M processors at its clients’ facilities. The sensors use wireless technology to transmit data to servers, which make all the necessary calculations. Our goal was to create an app for executives of mid-size and large businesses, which would process the data and display the results in a beautiful and user-friendly way.
Очередной заказчик, который к нам обрати: Yet another client who approached us, IntelliSense, was from Cambridge. Its order was a real challenge. IntelliSense is a British IOT (Internet-of-Things) company which specializes in water and power consumption monitoring, as well as in monitoring hazardous emissions. In doing this, the company uses state-of-the-art mobile and embedded technologies. Needless to say, we decided right away that we wanted to participate in something that could be really useful for the world as a whole, not only for our clients and us.
Кроме приложения, проект включал и втору: In addition to the app, the project had another no less important task: to create a beautiful and presentable turnkey website. Ark API – как Google, только для людей: Ark API — like Google, but for people
Найди полное досье на своего соседа. Раз: Get a full profile on your neighbour. Ark API — interface for ARK people search engine that can be embedded in any mobile application. Why keep address book with nothing else but telephone numbers when you can automatically get a full profile on anyone?
Суть краткая: Ark – это поисковая систем: In a nutshell, Ark is a search engine indexing social network profiles and it is designed not only to find people but to analyse their web activity. Ark API allows you to use all these features in mobile apps and Ark Mail is the palmary example.
Мы участвуем в разработке не просто «оче: We are taking part in development of not just "another" email client. Makeomatic is working on software that can help you to get additional information on your employee, business partner or a pen pal. The very first letter you receive will contain not only return address of your contact but all links to every social network he uses. Browse his profile on FaceBook, explore through best moments of his life captured on Instagram, perceive his past, present and future. Play the role of online private investigator. Complete information you receive will help you to assuage any doubts and establish business or informal relationship in a swift and effortless way.
В перспективе, благодаря Ark API, можно: In a longer term Ark API will allow you to make more precise website user analysis, improve mobile app promotion efforts and manage the site content to surpass customer's expectations.
